channel.title: Custom Dicing Help

item.title: Custom Dicing Help
item.dc:creator: @SpecialScape123 SpecialScape123
item.description:
@SpecialScape123 wrote:

Okay guys so im a newbie coding PI - eco-pkscape i think and i wanted to add a custom dice thing.
heres what i would like to know if it is possible.

if when i type ::rolldice which i have already added and the emote of rolling a dice appears but i want to know if it can force a random number from 1 - 100 when i type it but im not sure how.
this is my code at the moment:

if (playerCommand.equals(“rolldice”) && (c.playerRights >= 0)) {
c.sendMessage(“You roll the dice”);
c.startAnimation(11900);
}

if you understand what i mean by forcing the text to say a random number from 1 - 100 please re-write this code or tell me how to put it in.

:3 its probably really simple but im used to coding 317’s and i have stayed away from RSPS’s for quite awhile

Thanks.

Read full topic
